title: EPFO India Not Giving Rs 80,000 to Those Who Worked From 1990-2018
subtitle: Message suggesting that EPFO India was giving Rs 80,000 as benefits to workers who worked between 1990-2018 was being circulated. But, the message is fake with a link to a fake website.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The same message went viral in 2018 as well. People were encouraged to check the link provided in the messages to see if they were eligible to “withdraw” the amount.

The link to the website mentioned in the message is: https://seventhree.club/epf
